channel.title: Safe/PK Zones
channel.description:
I'm pretty good at this stuff, I just don't get the safe/pk zones. Could someone point me in the right direction?
Alright, on my server, I want to move everything to another place. Ex: From Varrock To Camelot. I move all my npcs, shops, and objects there, but everyone is getting pk'ed.
Does this have to do with the 'public boolean nonWild() {' ?

item.title: Safe/PK Zones
item.dc:creator: @The_Forgottn The_Forgottn
item.description:
@The_Forgottn wrote:

I did that… And for some reason, it isn’t working. =\

This is how I did it: if((absX >= 0001 && absX <= 0002 && absY >= 0003 && absY <=0004 ) ||

At the absX >= 0001, I put the left side X of the box…
At the absX <= 0002, I put the right side X of the box…
At the absY >= 0003, I put the top side Y of the box…
And at the absY <= 0004, I put the bottom side Y of the box.

Is that right?

Read full topic

item.title: Safe/PK Zones
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Yeh, use four coordinates to make a box and put that in nonWild.

Read full topic
